metadata.title: CVE-2017-17663 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The htpasswd implementation of mini_httpd before v1.28 and of thttpd beforev2.28 is affected by a buffer overflow that can be exploited remotely toperform code execution.

criterions.comment: mini-httpd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
